    <javascript>
      <jsitem location="inline" name="loadModels" cachelocation="false" url="">(function(skuid){
	var $ = skuid.$;
	$(document.body).one('pageload',function(){
	var paramId = skuid.page.params.id;
	    var pageName = skuid.page.params.page;
	    if(pageName && pageName == 'AddDealsToPackage'){
	        var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({});
	    } else{
    	    if(paramId){
        	    queryApplication(paramId);
        	}else{
        	    var newRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication').createRow({
        	        additionalConditions: [
                        { field: 'RecordTypeId', value: skuid.page.params.RecordType}
                    ]
        	    });
        	}
	    }
	});
})(skuid);

function queryApplication(id){
    var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
    var appIdCondition = applicationModel.getConditionByName('AppId');
    applicationModel.setCondition(appIdCondition,id);
    skuid.model.updateData([applicationModel],function(){});
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="fieldsRenderMode" cachelocation="false">var field = arguments[0],
    value = arguments[1];
 var renderMode = skuid.page.params.mode;
if(renderMode && renderMode == "read"){
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].read(field, value);
}else{
    skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype].edit(field, value);
}</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="getIncludedPageData" cachelocation="false" url="">var params = arguments[0],
	$ = skuid.$;
var productRow = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanCLProduct').getFirstRow();
var applicationModel = skuid.model.getModel('GeneralLoanApplication');
if(applicationModel && applicationModel.data && applicationModel.data[0] && productRow){
    applicationModel.data[0].genesis__CL_Product__c = productRow.Id;
}
var result = {
    'genesis__Applications__c' : applicationModel,
};

return result;

</jsitem>
    </javascript>
    <css/>
    <actionsequences uniqueid="sk-1Aip-470"/>
  </resources>
  <styles>
    <styleitem type="background" bgtype="none"/>
  </styles>
</skuidpage>

model="AccountBillingAddress"><contents/></template></field></fields></section></sections></column></columns></basicfieldeditor></components></editmodepopup><template><!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
    <script>
            var autocomplete1,
            accModelIndividualRegister = skuid.model.getModel('ContactMailingAddress'),
            accRowIndividualRegister = accModelIndividualRegister.data[0],
            autoCompleteInput1 = ($('#locationField1')[0]).getElementsByTagName('input')[0];
            //autoCompleteInput1 = ($('homeAddress inout'));
            //Google Place Initialize
            function initAutocompleteIndividualRegister() {
                autocomplete1 = new google.maps.places.Autocomplete(autoCompleteInput1, {types: ['geocode']});
                //Restrict the google place only show the specified country address and not allow other country address.
                autocomplete1.setComponentRestrictions({
                   country: ["aus"]
                });
                
                google.maps.event.addListener(autocomplete1, "place_changed", function() {
                  var place = autocomplete1.getPlace();
                  if(place.address_components){
                    var formatted_address = place.formatted_address;
                    var placeComponent = place.address_components;
                    var blank = '';
                    fillInAddress(placeComponent,formatted_address);
                  }else{
                    alert('Address not found.Please check your address details.');
                  }
                });
            }

            //Address data fillup for each type.
            function fillInAddress(placeComponent,formatted_address) {
              $.each(placeComponent,function(i,rowIndiPostal){ 
                    if(rowIndiPostal.types=='premise' || rowIndiPostal.types=='route'){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Street_Name__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name.split(" ")[0]
                        });
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Street_Type__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name.split(" ")[1]
                        });
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Duplicate_Street_Type__c : rowIndiPostal.short_name.split(" ")[1]
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('sublocality_level_1')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Street_Name__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name.split(" ")[0]
                        });
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Street_Type__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name.split(" ")[1]
                        });
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Duplicate_Street_Type__c : rowIndiPostal.short_name.split(" ")[1]
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('locality')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            clcommon__City__c : (rowIndiPostal.long_name).toUpperCase()
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('administrative_area_level_1')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            State__c : rowIndiPostal.short_name
                        });
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Duplicate_State_Name__c : rowIndiPostal.short_name
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('country')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            clcommon__Country__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('street_number')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            Street_No__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('postal_code')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            clcommon__Zip_Code__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name
                        });
                    }
                    else if(rowIndiPostal.types.includes('subpremise')){
                        accModelIndividualRegister.updateRow(accRowIndividualRegister,{
                            clcommon__County__c : rowIndiPostal.long_name
                        });
                    }
                    
                        
                    if(formatted_address){
                        document.getElementById('IndividualHomeAddress').focus();
                        document.getElementById('IndividualHomeAddress').value = formatted_address;
                        document.getElementById('IndividualHomeAddress').blur();
                        google.maps.event.clearInstanceListeners(autocomplete1);
                        initAutocompleteIndividualRegister();
                    }
              }) ; 
            }
            
            function setValue(value) {
                var text = document.getElementById('IndividualHomeAddress');
                setValueInField(text, value);
                text.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', {
                    bubbles: true
                }))
            }
            
            function setValueInField(element, value) {
                const {
                    set: valueSetter
                } = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(element, 'value') || {}
                const prototype = Object.getPrototypeOf(element) 
                const {
                    set: prototypeValueSetter
                } = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(prototype, 'value') || {}
                if (prototypeValueSetter && valueSetter !== prototypeValueSetter) {
                    prototypeValueSetter.call(element, value)
                } else if (valueSetter) {
                    valueSetter.call(element, value)
                } else {
                    throw new Error('The given element does not have a value setter')
                }
            }

            //Get and Set the location.
            function geolocate() {
                if (navigator.geolocation) {
                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function(position) {
                      var geolocation = {
                        lat: position.coords.latitude,
                        lng: position.coords.longitude
                      };
                      var circle = new google.maps.Circle(
                          {center: geolocation, radius: position.coords.accuracy});
                      autocomplete1.setBounds(circle.getBounds());
                    });
                }
            }
            function keepCheckingForAutoComplete(){
                if(typeof google === "undefined"){
                    setTimeout(keepCheckingForAutoComplete, 1000);
                }
                else{
                    initAutocompleteIndividualRegister();
                }
            }
            keepCheckingForAutoComplete();
        </script>
</head>

<body>
    <div id="locationField1">
        <input id="IndividualHomeAddress" placeholder="Enter your address" onFocus="geolocate()" type="text" />
    </div>
</body>

</html></template></field></fields></section></sections></column></columns></fields></section><section title="New Section" collapsible="no" uniqueid="sk-3dYc-6711" showheader="false"><fields><columns     row = field.row,
    $ = skuid.$;
 var firstValue = skuid.utils.decodeHTML(arguments[1]);

skuid.ui.fieldRenderers[field.metadata.displaytype][field.mode](field,firstValue);

 var div = document.createElement('div');
$(div).attr("class", "nx-error-inline");
$(div).attr("id", "error-msg");

field.element.change(function(){
    var value = skuid.model.getModel('Contact').getFirstRow().Number_Of_Dependents__c ;
    var noOfDependent = /^[0-9]{1,}$/ ;  // /^[0-9]{1,}$/
    if(value){
        if(value!=undefined && value!='' && value!=null && !noOfDependent.test(value)){
            div.append('Number of Dependent can only be number.');
        }
        else{
             $("#error-msg").empty() ;
        }
        setTimeout(function(){
            ((document.getElementsByClassName("noOfDependent")[0]).getElementsByClassName("nx-field")[0]).append(div);
        },500);
    }
});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="CompanyTrustSuburbCapital" cachelocation="false">var AccountBillingAddressModel = skuid.model.getModel('AccountBillingAddress');

sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'Contact', 
    sectionName : 'Are you applying with your partner?',
    renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
    paramId : contactModel.data[0].Id,
    listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,

});
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'Contact',

});

var value1 = contactModel.data[0].Birthdate;
var value2 = officeModel.data[0].loan__Current_System_Date__c;
var date2 = new Date(value2);
var date1 = new Date(value1);
var diffInTime = date2.getTime() - date1.getTime(); 
var diffInYrs = diffInTime / (1000 * 3600 * 24 * 365);
if(contactModel.data[0].Birthdate === undefined || diffInYrs < 45){
    sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
    {   objectName : 'clcommon__Party__c', 
        sectionName : 'Some Section',
        renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
        paramId : partyModel.data[0].Id,
        listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,
        isFieldData : true,
        listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Exit_Strategy__c;Exit_Strategy_Suitable__c;Exit_Strategy_Commentary__c',
        shouldClearField : true
    });
}
value1 = contactModel.data[0].Temporary_Visa_Expiry_Date__c;
date2 = new Date(value1);
date1 = new Date(value2);
diffInTime = date2.getTime() - date1.getTime(); 
var diffInMonths = diffInTime / (1000 * 3600 * 24 * 30);
if(contactModel.data[0].Temporary_Visa_Suitability__c === undefined || contactModel.data[0].Temporary_Visa_Suitability__c === 'No'){
    sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
    {   objectName : 'Contact', 
        sectionName : 'Some Section',
        renderedObjectName : 'Contact',
        paramId : contactModel.data[0].Id,
        listOfIds : contactModel.data[0].Id,
        isFieldData : true,
        listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Temporary_Visa_Suitability_Commentary__c',
        shouldClearField : true
    });
}
if(contactModel.data[0].Australian_Citizen__c === undefined || contactModel.data[0].Australian_Citizen__c !== 'No'
    || contactModel.data[0].Applicant_reside_in_Australia__c === undefined || contactModel.data[0].Applicant_reside_in_Australia__c !== 'Yes'
    || contactModel.data[0].Has_applied_for_Permanent_Residency_Visa__c === undefined || contactModel.data[0].Has_applied_for_Permanent_Residency_Visa__c !== 'No'
    || contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Residential_Status__c === undefined || contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Residential_Status__c !== 'Temporary'
    || contactModel.data[0].Temporary_Visa_Expiry_Date__c === undefined || Number(diffInMonths) >= 12){
    sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
    {   objectName : 'Contact', 
        sectionName : 'Some Section',
        renderedObjectName : 'Contact',
        paramId : contactModel.data[0].Id,
        listOfIds : contactModel.data[0].Id,
        isFieldData : true,
        listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Temporary_Visa_Suitability__c;Temporary_Visa_Suitability_Commentary__c',
        shouldClearField : true
    });
}
var flag = false;
if(partyModel.data[0].Party_Type_Name__c !== 'Household'
|| partyModel.data[0].Party_Type_Name__c !== 'Guarantor'){
    if(contactModel.data.length > 0){
        if((contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Marital_Status__c === undefined
        || (contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Marital_Status__c !== 'Divorced'
        && contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Marital_Status__c !== 'Separated'
        && contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Marital_Status__c !== 'Single'
        && contactModel.data[0].clcommon__Marital_Status__c !== 'Widowed'))){
            if(partyModel.data[0].Is_this_a_joint_applicant__c === undefined
                || partyModel.data[0].Is_this_a_joint_applicant__c === 'Yes'){
                flag = true;
            }
        }
    }else{
        flag = true;
    }
}
var listOfFields = 'Primary_Residence_Property_Costs__c;Clothing_Personal_Care__c;Medical_Health__c;Childcare_Monthly_Income__c;Insurance__c;Recreation_Entertainment__c;Other_Expenses__c;'+
'Telephone_Media_Streaming_Amount__c;Memberships_gym_sporting_clubs_etc__c;Description_for_Other_Discretionary_exp__c;Groceries__c;Transport_Monthly_Amount__c;Education_excluding_Private_School_Fees__c;'+
'Investment_Property_Costs__c;Private_Health_Life_and_IP_Insurance__c;Maintenance_Alimony__c;Education_Private_School_Fees__c;Non_Compulsory_Superannuation__c;Rent_Board_Monthly_Amount__c;HEM__c;'+
'Living_Expense_Used_for_Servicing_Purpos__c;Living_Expense_Explanation_Received__c;Living_Expense_Explanation_Suitable__c;Living_Expense_Suitale_Commentary__c;Bank_Statements_Required_to_be_Reviewed__c;'+
'Bank_Statments_Reviewed__c';
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'Contact',
    sectionName : 'Some Section',
    renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
    paramId : contactModel.data[0].Id,
    listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    isFieldData : true,

	$ = skuid.$;
var partyModel  = skuid.model.getModel('Party');
var parRow    = partyModel.data[0];
var appModel  = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationRen');
var appRow    = appModel.data[0];
var smsfModel  = skuid.model.getModel('SMSFModel');

    if(parRow.ABN_Company_Name__c !== undefined ){
        var res = sforce.apex.execute('SMSFABNNameSearchCallout','searchBySMSFName',
        {
            partyId : parRow.Id
           
        });
        if(res[0] === null){
            alert('Something went wrong!');
            $.unblockUI();
            var apptyObj = new sforce.SObject("genesis__applications__c");
            apptyObj.Id = appRow.Id;
            apptyObj.Button_disable__c = false;
            var result = sforce.connection.update([apptyObj]);
            appModel.updateData();
            return false;
        }
        var obj = JSON.parse(res);
        var smsfNames;
        if(obj.superFundNamesPayload.response.matchingFundNames201908 === null){
            $.unblockUI();
            var apptyObj = new sforce.SObject("genesis__applications__c");
            apptyObj.Id = appRow.Id;
            apptyObj.Button_disable__c = false;
            var result = sforce.connection.update([apptyObj]);
            appModel.updateData();
            return;
        }
        try{
            smsfNames = obj.superFundNamesPayload.response.matchingFundNames201908;
        }
        catch(ex){
            return;
        }

        var count = Number(smsfNames.numberOfRecords.nodeValue);
        for(var index = count - 1;index >= 0;index--){
            
            smsfModel.createRow();

            smsfModel.data[0].ABN = smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].abn.value.nodeValue;
            smsfModel.data[0].Status = smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].abn.identifierStatus.nodeValue;
            smsfModel.data[0].Entity_Name = smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].fundName.name.nodeValue;
            smsfModel.data[0].Fund_Type = smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].fundName.fundTypeDescription.nodeValue;
            smsfModel.data[0].Location = smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].location.postcode.nodeValue + " " + smsfNames.matchingFundName[index].location.stateTerritoryCode.nodeValue;
        }
    }

    else{
        alert('Trust Name has not been attached!');
        $.unblockUI();
        var apptyObj = new sforce.SObject("genesis__applications__c");
        apptyObj.Id = appRow.Id;
        apptyObj.Button_disable__c = false;
        var result = sforce.connection.update([apptyObj]);
        appModel.updateData();
        return false;
    }

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="ABN Number Callout" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    $ = skuid.$;
    var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('Party');
    var partyRow = partyModel.data[0];
    var accModel = skuid.model.getModel('Account');
    var accRow = accModel.data[0];
    var records = skuid.$.map(arguments[0].list.getSelectedItems(),function(item){
        return item.row;
    });
    if ( !records[0]  || records.length < 1) {
        alert("Please select at least one Trust");
        $.unblockUI();
    }else if(records  && records.length > 1){
        alert("Please select only one Trust");
        $.unblockUI();
    } else{
        var result = sforce.apex.execute('SMSFSearchByABNNumberCallout','searchByABNNumber',
        {  
            abn : records[0].ABN,
            partyId : partyRow.Id
         });
    }
    if(result !== null){
        var object = JSON.parse(result);
        var trustDetails;
        try{
            trustDetails = object.superFundPayload.response;
        }
        catch(ex){
            return;
        }
        
        
        if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.identifier !== null){
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'Company_ABN__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.identifier.value.nodeValue);
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'Company_ABN_Status__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.identifier.identifierStatus.description.nodeValue);
            var position = trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.identifier.identifierStatus.startDate.nodeValue.indexOf('T');
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'ABN_Effective_From__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.identifier.identifierStatus.startDate.nodeValue.substring(0,position));
        }
        if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.organisationName !== null){
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'Company_Name_As_Per_ABN_Search__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.organisationName.name.nodeValue);
            accModel.updateRow(accRow,'Name',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.organisationName.name.nodeValue);
        }
        if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.fundType !== null){
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'Entity_Type__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.fundType.description.nodeValue);
        }
        if(trustDetails.dateTimeRetrieved !== null){
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'Record_Extract_Date__c',trustDetails.dateTimeRetrieved.nodeValue);
        }
        if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus !== null){
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.description.nodeValue);
            /*if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.code.nodeValue == 'Y'){
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.description.nodeValue);
            }
            else if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.code.nodeValue == 'N'){
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c',trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.description.nodeValue);
            }
            else if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.code.nodeValue == 'R'){
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c','Registered');
            }
            else if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.code.nodeValue == 'P'){
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c','Election to be regulated is being processed');
            }
            else if(trustDetails.superannuationFund2015.complyingStatus.code.nodeValue == 'E'){
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c','Regulation details removed');
            }
            else{
                partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c','Regulation details withheld');
            }*/
        }
        else{
            partyModel.updateRow(partyRow,'SMSF_Status__c','This ABN has been cancelled and the fund may no longer be operating');
        }
    }</jsitem><jsitem location="external" name="connectionJS" cachelocation="false" url="/soap/ajax/35.0/connection.js">var params = arguments[0],

	$ = skuid.$;
var partyModel = skuid.model.getModel('ALNGParty');
var assetModel = skuid.model.getModel('Assets');
var flag = true ;
$.each(assetModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
    if(row.genesis__Asset_Type__c === 'Gifts'){
        flag = false ;
    }
});
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'clcommon__Party__c', 
    sectionName : 'Some Section',
    renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
    paramId : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    isFieldData : true,
    listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Gift_Stat_Dec_Received__c',
    shouldClearField : flag
});
flag = true;
$.each(assetModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
    if(row.genesis__Asset_Type__c === 'Investment Property'){
        flag = false;
    }
});
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'clcommon__Party__c', 
    sectionName : 'Some Section',
    renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
    paramId : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    isFieldData : true,
    listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Rental_Income_Verified__c',
    shouldClearField : flag
});
var liabilityModel = skuid.model.getModel('Liabilities');
flag = true;
$.each(liabilityModel.getRows(),function(i,row){
    if(row.To_Be_Refinanced__c === true){
        flag = false;
        return;
    }
});
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseRelatedObjectFieldData',
{   objectName : 'clcommon__Party__c', 
    sectionName : 'Some Section',
    renderedObjectName : 'clcommon__Party__c',
    paramId : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    listOfIds : partyModel.data[0].Id,
    isFieldData : true,
    listOffieldNamesIfFieldData : 'Previous_conduct_referencing_completed__c',
    shouldClearField : flag
});
sforce.apex.execute('EraseRedundantData','eraseHiddenFieldsDataOf', { objectName : 'clcommon__Party__c', paramId : partyModel.data[0].Id });</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="rentalIncomeVerified" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

</cssitem><cssitem location="inline" name="CreditDisplay" cachelocation="false">#credit-score-number-view {
    width: 100%;
    text-align: right;
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    line-height: 70px;
}

#credit-score-number-view .credit-score-bg {
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-size: 48px;
    color: white;
    background-color: #48CE94;
    padding-left: 12px;
    padding-right: 12px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 70px;
    border-radius: 5px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}

#credit-score-simple-view {
    margin-top: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 15px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-header,
#credit-score-simple-view .nx-editor-contents {
    margin: 0;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-item {
    white-space: nowrap;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row {
    height: 20px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    line-height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-value {
    background-color: #7F7F7F;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding-left: 10px;
    padding-right: 10px;
    margin-right: 5px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .credit-score-row .credit-score-type {
    display: inline-block;
    height: 20px;
}

#credit-score-simple-view .nx-list-footer {
    display: none;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry {
    background-color: #1CBDD4;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: 10px;
    padding: 5px 12px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-basicfieldeditor-item-label {
    width: 80%;
    color: white;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field {
    width: 20%;
    text-align: right;
}

#credit-report-summary .credit-report-summary-entry .nx-field .nx-fieldtext {
    background-color: white;
    color: #1CBDD4;
    width: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline-block;
    font-weight: 700;
}

#credit-score-figure {
    position: relative;
    height: 60px;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar {
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 15px;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 0;
    background-color: red;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-colorbar-tick {
    position: absolute;
    height: 25px;
    width: 4px;
    border: 1px solid #7F7F7F;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-figure .credit-score-number-sm {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #2D5074;
    color: white;
    font-size: 11px;
    padding: 3px 10px;
    border-radius: 3px;
    display: inline-block;
}

#credit-score-bar-wrapper {
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;

}

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="Generate Pricing" cachelocation="false">var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('CommonApplicationLoanDetails');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];
if(!(appRow.Repayment_Type__c === '' || appRow.Repayment_Type__c === undefined || appRow.Actual_LVR__c === '' || appRow.Actual_LVR__c === undefined || appRow.Interest_type__c === '' || appRow.Interest_type__c === undefined || appRow.Primary_loan_purpose_list__c === '' || appRow.Primary_loan_purpose_list__c === undefined || appRow.Document_Type__c === '' || appRow.Document_Type__c === undefined || appRow.Risk_grade_list__c === '' || appRow.Risk_grade_list__c === undefined || appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c === '' || appRow.genesis__Loan_Amount__c === undefined)){
    $.blockUI({
        message: 'Pricing is getting generated.',
        onBlock:function(){
            var pricingResult2 = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidPricingCtrl','generatePricing',
            {   
                    applicationId : appRow.Id
            });
            var pricingResult3 = pricingResult2+'';
            if(pricingResult3 === 'Pricing not applicable for the given determining factors.'){
                pricingResult2 = 'No pricing record has been found from uploaded active rate cards so matrix rate is updated to 99.99%.';
            }
            var pricingResult = sforce.apex.execute('PricingUpdate','updatePricing',
            {   
                    applicationId : appRow.Id
            });
            var scheduleResult2 = sforce.apex.execute('genesis.SkuidNewApplication','generateSchedule',
            {   
                    applicationId : appRow.Id
            });
            setTimeout(function(){
            alert(pricingResult2);
            appModel.updateData();
            $.unblockUI();
         }, 5000); // 5 Seconds timeout
        }
    });
}
else{
    alert('Please enter all the Pricing Criteria - Document Type, LVR, Interest Type, Repayment Type, Risk Grade, Primary Purpose and Loan Amount to generate Pricing.');
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="NewRelationship" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

$('#newRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
$('#existingRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
if(!newPartyRow){
    var newRow = newPartyModel.createRow({
        additionalConditions: [
            { field: 'NewRelationship', value:true },
            { field: 'ExistingRelationship', value: false },
        ]
    });
}else{
    newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow ,{
                            NewRelationship : true ,
                            ExistingRelationship : false,
                            BusinessRelationship : false ,
                            IndividualRelationship : false,
                            clcommon__Account__c : null
                        }
    );
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="queryAccount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
// if nothing is selected and user moves forward
if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship && (!(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship))){
    $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
    $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
    newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship = true;
    newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c = null;
}

//fetch model and cancel any changes
var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
newAccountModel.cancel();

var newCollateralOwnersModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
newCollateralOwnersModel.cancel();

var newBIModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
newBIModel.cancel();

var newPartyModelClone = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModelClone');
newPartyModelClone.cancel();

var newContactModelForExistingRel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModelForExistingRel');
newContactModelForExistingRel.cancel();

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
newContactModel.cancel();

// validate
if(newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
    if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
        var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
        var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
        editor.clearMessages();
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please select an existing account',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return;
    }
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship) {
        var sql = "select name from contact where AccountId= '"+newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c+"'";
        result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
        if(result.size==0){
          var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
          var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
          editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'No contact is associated with account, please associate a contact to this account to proceed further.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
          );
          return;
     }
    }

}

//fetch conditions
var accountIdCondition = newAccountModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var partyAccountIdCondition = newPartyModelClone.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var coAccountIdCondition = newCollateralOwnersModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var biIdCondition = newBIModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var newContactModelIdCondition = newContactModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');

// set and activate condtions
if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
}else{
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,'');
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,'');
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,'');
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,'');
}

//query models
skuid.model.updateData([newAccountModel, newCollateralOwnersModel, newPartyModelClone, newContactModelForExistingRel, newContactModel],function(){
    createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel);
    createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel);
    createNewContactRow(newContactModel);
    if(!newPartyRow.NewRelationship && newPartyModelClone.data && newPartyModelClone.data.length == 1){

    }else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow,{
                                    clcommon__Type__c: null,
                                    clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c : null,
                                    clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c : null,
                                });
    }

    //query bi for account
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length > 0 && newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
    }else{
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,'');
    }

    skuid.model.updateData([newBIModel],function(){
        createNewBIRow(newBIModel);
        moveToNextStepPls();
    });
});

function createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel){
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newAccountModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:true },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:false },
                //{ field: 'Name', value:'Set Account Name' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewContactRow(newContactModel){
    if(newContactModel.data && newContactModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newContactModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:false },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:true }

            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel){
    if(newCollateralOwnersModel.data && newCollateralOwnersModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newCollateralOwnersModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Ownership__c', value: 100 },
                { field: 'clcommon__Collateral__c', value: null},
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewBIRow(newBIModel){
    if(newBIModel.data && newBIModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newBIModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                //{ field: 'genesis__Business_Legal_Name__c', value:'Set Business Info' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function moveToNextStepPls(){
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveUpdateParty" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('disable');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];

var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
var newAccountRow = newAccountModel.data[0];
console.log('newAccountRow ##',newAccountRow);

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
var newContactRow = newContactModel.data[0];
console.log('newContactRow ## ',newContactRow);

var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];

var collateralOwnerModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
var collData = [];
collateralOwnerModel.data.forEach(function (colDataObj){
    if(!collateralOwnerModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(colDataObj) && colDataObj.clcommon__Collateral__c){
        collData.push(colDataObj);
    }
});
collateralOwnerModel.data = collData;

var consentPage = $('#consentTitle');
var editorNew = consentPage.data('object').editor;
editorNew.clearMessages();

if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Electronic_Consent__c){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Please sign electronic consent',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
    return false;
}

if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Electronic_Consent__c && (!newContactRow.Email || newContactRow.Email ==="")&&newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Please capture e-mail ID of the customer',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
    return false;
}
var partyArgs = {};

if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship) {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
} else {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
}
// if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
//     partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
//     partyArgs[1] = null;
// }
// if(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
//     partyArgs[0] = null;
//     partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
// }

var bModel = businessInfoModel;
if (Object.keys(businessInfoModel.data[0]).length <= 2){
    bModel = null;
}

var res = saveParty(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],bModel,collateralOwnerModel);
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);

if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        var contactId = resObj.content[0].clcommon__Contact__r.Id;
        newContactModel.updateRow(newContactRow, {
            Id: contactId
        });
        
        newPartyRow.SaveParty = false;
        $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    }
    return true;
}else{
    $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateEmployementAndIncome" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

let moveToNextStep = true;

var employmentInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EmploymentInformationModel');

$.each(employmentInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Current employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var previousEmploymentInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('PreviousEmploymentInfoModel');

$.each(previousEmploymentInfoModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let endDate = row.genesis__End_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (endDate === '' || endDate === null || endDate === undefined || endDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (startDate>endDate ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date needs to be greater than start date.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var otherIncomeModel = skuid.model.getModel('OtherIncomeModel');

$.each(otherIncomeModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Income name can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});


if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step6');
}

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateAssetsAndLiabilities" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,

    $ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

let moveToNextStep = true;

var assetInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetInformationModel');

$.each(assetInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let acquisitionDate = row.genesis__Date_of_Acquisition__c;
    let marketValueDate = row.genesis__Market_Value_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (acquisitionDate === '' || acquisitionDate === null || acquisitionDate === undefined || acquisitionDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Date of Acquisition cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (marketValueDate === '' || marketValueDate === null || marketValueDate === undefined || marketValueDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Market Value Date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Asset description can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var liabilityInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LiabilityInformationModel');

$.each(liabilityInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    let paymentAmount = row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c;
    let amountOwing = row.genesis__Amount_Owing__c;
    
    if (paymentAmount>amountOwing) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Payment amount cannot be greater than amount owing.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});



if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step7');
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="queryAccount" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
// if nothing is selected and user moves forward
if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship && (!(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship))){
    $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
    $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
    newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship = true;
    newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c = null;
}

//fetch model and cancel any changes
var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
newAccountModel.cancel();

var newCollateralOwnersModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
newCollateralOwnersModel.cancel();

var newBIModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
newBIModel.cancel();

var newPartyModelClone = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModelClone');
newPartyModelClone.cancel();

var newContactModelForExistingRel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModelForExistingRel');
newContactModelForExistingRel.cancel();

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
newContactModel.cancel();

// validate
if(newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
    if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
        var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
        var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
        editor.clearMessages();
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please select an existing account',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return;
    }
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship) {
        var sql = "select name from contact where AccountId= '"+newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c+"'";
        result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
        if(result.size==0){
          var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
          var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
          editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'No contact is associated with account, please associate a contact to this account to proceed further.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
          );
          return;
     }
    }

}

//fetch conditions
var accountIdCondition = newAccountModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var partyAccountIdCondition = newPartyModelClone.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var coAccountIdCondition = newCollateralOwnersModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var biIdCondition = newBIModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var newContactModelIdCondition = newContactModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');

// set and activate condtions
if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
}else{
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,'');
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,'');
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,'');
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,'');
}

//query models
skuid.model.updateData([newAccountModel, newCollateralOwnersModel, newPartyModelClone, newContactModelForExistingRel, newContactModel],function(){
    createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel);
    createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel);
    createNewContactRow(newContactModel);
    if(!newPartyRow.NewRelationship && newPartyModelClone.data && newPartyModelClone.data.length == 1){

    }else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow,{
                                    clcommon__Type__c: null,
                                    clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c : null,
                                    clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c : null,
                                });
    }

    //query bi for account
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length > 0 && newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
    }else{
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,'');
    }

    skuid.model.updateData([newBIModel],function(){
        createNewBIRow(newBIModel);
        moveToNextStepPls();
    });
});

function createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel){
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newAccountModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:true },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:false },
                //{ field: 'Name', value:'Set Account Name' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewContactRow(newContactModel){
    if(newContactModel.data && newContactModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newContactModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:false },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:true }

            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel){
    if(newCollateralOwnersModel.data && newCollateralOwnersModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newCollateralOwnersModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Ownership__c', value: 100 },
                { field: 'clcommon__Collateral__c', value: null},
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewBIRow(newBIModel){
    if(newBIModel.data && newBIModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newBIModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                //{ field: 'genesis__Business_Legal_Name__c', value:'Set Business Info' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function moveToNextStepPls(){
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="moveToStep4" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;
stepEditor.clearMessages();
var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
var models;

var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle3');
var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
editor.clearMessages();
if(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship){
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewAccountModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}else{
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}
var contactMdl = skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel");
contactRow = contactMdl.data[0];
let moveToNextStep = true;
if(contactRow&&newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
    let birthDate = contactRow.Birthdate;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
    
    if (birthDate === '' || birthDate === null || birthDate === undefined || birthDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
                message: 'BirthDate cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if((contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c === undefined||contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c<1)||(contactRow.clcommon__Years_At_Current_Address__c==1&&(contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c<=0||contactRow.clcommon__Months_at_current_address__c===undefined )))
    {
        if(!(contactRow.OtherStreet&&contactRow.OtherCity&&contactRow.OtherState&&contactRow.OtherPostalCode&&contactRow.OtherCountry))
        {
            stepEditor.handleMessages(
                [
                  {
                      message: 'Previous address cannot be blank',
                      severity: 'ERROR'
                  },
                ]
            );
            moveToNextStep = false;
            return false;
        }
    }
    if(!contactRow.Email || contactRow.Email ==="")
    {
        stepEditor.handleMessages(
            [
               {
                  message: 'Please capture e-mail ID of the customer',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
               },
            ]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
}

if(!moveToNextStep)
    return false;

if(contactMdl.data[0]){
    if(contactMdl.data[0].Email  || skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel").data[0].Email){
        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").hide();
    }else{
        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").show();
    }
}
var vres = validateAllRequiredFields($,editor,models);
if(!vres){
    return vres;
}
</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="saveUpdateParty" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
$ = skuid.$;

skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('disable');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];

var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
var newAccountRow = newAccountModel.data[0];
console.log('newAccountRow ##',newAccountRow);

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
var newContactRow = newContactModel.data[0];
console.log('newContactRow ## ',newContactRow);

var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];

var collateralOwnerModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
var collData = [];
collateralOwnerModel.data.forEach(function (colDataObj){
    if(!collateralOwnerModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(colDataObj) && colDataObj.clcommon__Collateral__c){
        collData.push(colDataObj);
    }
});
collateralOwnerModel.data = collData;

var consentPage = $('#consentTitle');
var editorNew = consentPage.data('object').editor;
editorNew.clearMessages();

/*if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Electronic_Consent__c){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Please sign electronic consent',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
    return false;
}*/

/*if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Electronic_Consent__c && (!newContactRow.Email || newContactRow.Email ==="")&&newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
           {
              message: 'Please capture e-mail ID of the customer',
              severity: 'ERROR'
           },
        ]
    );
    skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('enable');
    return false;
}*/
var partyArgs = {};

if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship) {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
} else {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
}
// if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
//     partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
//     partyArgs[1] = null;
// }
// if(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
//     partyArgs[0] = null;
//     partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
// }

var bModel = businessInfoModel;
if (Object.keys(businessInfoModel.data[0]).length <= 2){
    bModel = null;
}

var res = saveParty(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],bModel,collateralOwnerModel);
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);

if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        var contactId = resObj.content[0].clcommon__Contact__r.Id;
        newContactModel.updateRow(newContactRow, {
            Id: contactId
        });
        
        newPartyRow.SaveParty = false;
        $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    }
    return true;
}else{
    $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}</jsitem>

      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateEmployementAndIncome" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

let moveToNextStep = true;

var employmentInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EmploymentInformationModel');

$.each(employmentInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Current employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var previousEmploymentInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('PreviousEmploymentInfoModel');

$.each(previousEmploymentInfoModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let endDate = row.genesis__End_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (endDate === '' || endDate === null || endDate === undefined || endDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (startDate>endDate ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date needs to be greater than start date.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var otherIncomeModel = skuid.model.getModel('OtherIncomeModel');

$.each(otherIncomeModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Income name can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});


if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step6');
}

</jsitem>
      <jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateAssetsAndLiabilities" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

let moveToNextStep = true;

var assetInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetInformationModel');

$.each(assetInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let acquisitionDate = row.genesis__Date_of_Acquisition__c;
    let marketValueDate = row.genesis__Market_Value_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (acquisitionDate === '' || acquisitionDate === null || acquisitionDate === undefined || acquisitionDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Date of Acquisition cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (marketValueDate === '' || marketValueDate === null || marketValueDate === undefined || marketValueDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Market Value Date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Asset description can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var liabilityInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LiabilityInformationModel');

$.each(liabilityInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    let paymentAmount = row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c;
    let amountOwing = row.genesis__Amount_Owing__c;
    
    if (paymentAmount>amountOwing) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Payment amount cannot be greater than amount owing.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});



if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step7');
}</jsitem>

  step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];
// if nothing is selected and user moves forward
if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship && (!(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship || newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship))){
    $('#businessRelation').addClass('selected-btn');
    $('#indiividualRelation').removeClass('selected-btn');
    newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship = true;
    newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c = null;
}

//fetch model and cancel any changes
var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
newAccountModel.cancel();

var newCollateralOwnersModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
newCollateralOwnersModel.cancel();

var newBIModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
newBIModel.cancel();

var newPartyModelClone = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModelClone');
newPartyModelClone.cancel();

var newContactModelForExistingRel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModelForExistingRel');
newContactModelForExistingRel.cancel();

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
newContactModel.cancel();

// validate
if(newPartyRow.ExistingRelationship){
    if(!newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
        var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
        var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
        editor.clearMessages();
        editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'Please select an existing account',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
        );
        return;
    }
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship) {
        var sql = "select name from contact where AccountId= '"+newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c+"'";
        result = sforce.connection.query(sql);
        if(result.size==0){
          var pageTitle = $('#errorTitle2');
          var editor = pageTitle.data('object').editor;
          editor.handleMessages(
            [
              {
                  message: 'No contact is associated with account, please associate a contact to this account to proceed further.',
                  severity: 'ERROR'
              },
            ]
          );
          return;
     }
    }

}

//fetch conditions
var accountIdCondition = newAccountModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var partyAccountIdCondition = newPartyModelClone.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var coAccountIdCondition = newCollateralOwnersModel.getConditionByName('clcommon__Account__c');
var biIdCondition = newBIModel.getConditionByName('Id');
var newContactModelIdCondition = newContactModel.getConditionByName('AccountId');

// set and activate condtions
if(newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c){
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,newPartyRow.clcommon__Account__c);
}else{
    newAccountModel.setCondition(accountIdCondition,'');
    newPartyModelClone.setCondition(partyAccountIdCondition,'');
    newCollateralOwnersModel.setCondition(coAccountIdCondition,'');
    newContactModel.setCondition(newContactModelIdCondition,null);
}

//query models
skuid.model.updateData([newAccountModel, newCollateralOwnersModel, newPartyModelClone, newContactModelForExistingRel, newContactModel],function(){
    createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel);
    createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel);
    createNewContactRow(newContactModel);
    if(!newPartyRow.NewRelationship && newPartyModelClone.data && newPartyModelClone.data.length == 1){

    }else{
        newPartyModel.updateRow(newPartyRow,{
                                    clcommon__Type__c: null,
                                    clcommon__Signer_Capacity__c : null,
                                    clcommon__Signing_on_Behalf_of__c : null,
                                });
    }

    //query bi for account
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length > 0 && newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c){
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,newAccountModel.data[0].genesis__Business_Information__c);
    }else{
        newBIModel.setCondition(biIdCondition,'');
    }

    skuid.model.updateData([newBIModel],function(){
        createNewBIRow(newBIModel);
        moveToNextStepPls();
    });
});

function createNewAccountRow(newAccountModel){
    if(newAccountModel.data && newAccountModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newAccountModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:true },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:false },
                //{ field: 'Name', value:'Set Account Name' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewContactRow(newContactModel){
    if(newContactModel.data && newContactModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newContactModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'BusinessRelationship', value:false },
                { field: 'IndividualRelationship', value:true }

            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewCORow(newCollateralOwnersModel){
    if(newCollateralOwnersModel.data && newCollateralOwnersModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newCollateralOwnersModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                { field: 'clcommon__Ownership__c', value: 100 },
                { field: 'clcommon__Collateral__c', value: null},
            ]
        });
    }
}

function createNewBIRow(newBIModel){
    if(newBIModel.data && newBIModel.data.length < 1){
        var newRow = newBIModel.createRow({
            additionalConditions: [
                //{ field: 'genesis__Business_Legal_Name__c', value:'Set Business Info' },
            ]
        });
    }
}

function moveToNextStepPls(){
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step3');

$ = skuid.$;

skuid.$('.nx-wizard-step .ui-button:visible').has('.ui-button-text:contains(Save)').button('disable');

var newPartyModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewPartyModel');
var newPartyRow = newPartyModel.data[0];

var appModel = skuid.model.getModel('ApplicationModel');
var appRow = appModel.data[0];

var newAccountModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewAccountModel');
var newAccountRow = newAccountModel.data[0];

var newContactModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewContactModel');
var newContactRow = newContactModel.data[0];

var businessInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('NewBusinessInfoModel');
var businessInfoRow = businessInfoModel.data[0];

var collateralOwnerModel = skuid.model.getModel('CollateralOwnerModel');
var collData = [];
collateralOwnerModel.data.forEach(function (colDataObj){
    if(!collateralOwnerModel.isRowMarkedForDeletion(colDataObj) && colDataObj.clcommon__Collateral__c){
        collData.push(colDataObj);
    }
});
collateralOwnerModel.data = collData;

var consentPage = $('#consentTitle');
var editorNew = consentPage.data('object').editor;
editorNew.clearMessages();
var partyArgs = {};

if(newPartyRow.NewRelationship) {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
} else {
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        partyArgs[0] = newContactModel;
        partyArgs[1] = null;
    } else {
        partyArgs[0] = null;
        partyArgs[1] = newAccountModel;
    }
}
var bModel = businessInfoModel;
if (Object.keys(businessInfoModel.data[0]).length <= 2){
    bModel = null;
}

var res = saveParty(newPartyModel,partyArgs[0],partyArgs[1],bModel,collateralOwnerModel);
var resObj = JSON.parse(res);

var partType = newPartyRow.clcommon__Type__r.Name;
if(partType == 'Broker'){
   appModel.updateRow(appRow,'Broker_Trail_Percentage__c',newAccountRow.Broker_Trail_Percentage__c);
   appModel.updateRow(appRow,'Commission_Paid_To__c',newAccountRow.Commission_Paid_To__c);
   appModel.updateRow(appRow,'Percentage_Of_Commission__c',newAccountRow.Percentage_Of_Commission__c);
   appModel.save();
}


if(resObj.status == 'SUCCESS'){
    if(newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
        var contactId = resObj.content[0].clcommon__Contact__r.Id;
        newContactModel.updateRow(newContactRow, {
            Id: contactId
        });
        newPartyRow.SaveParty = false;
        $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    }
   return true;
    
}else{
    $("#PartySaveButton").button('enable');
    editorNew.handleMessages(
        [
          {
              message: resObj.errorMessage,
              severity: 'ERROR'
          },
        ]
    );
    return false;
}
window.location.reload();</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="moveToStep4" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

editor.clearMessages();
if(newPartyRow.BusinessRelationship){
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewAccountModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}else{
    models = [
        skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel"),
        skuid.model.getModel("NewBusinessInfoModel")
    ];
}
var contactMdl = skuid.model.getModel("NewContactModel");
contactRow = contactMdl.data[0];
let moveToNextStep = true;
if(contactRow&&newPartyRow.IndividualRelationship){
    let birthDate = contactRow.Birthdate;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());
}

if(!moveToNextStep)
    return false;

if(contactMdl.data[0]){

        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").hide();

        $("#consentTitle .nx-error").show();
    }
}
var vres = validateAllRequiredFields($,editor,models);

    return vres;
}

	$ = skuid.$;
closeTopLevelDialogAndRefresh({window:true});</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateEmployementAndIncome" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],
    step = params.step,
    stepEditor = step.editor,
    $ = skuid.$;

stepEditor.clearMessages();

let moveToNextStep = true;

var employmentInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('EmploymentInformationModel');

$.each(employmentInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Current employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var previousEmploymentInfoModel = skuid.model.getModel('PreviousEmploymentInfoModel');

$.each(previousEmploymentInfoModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let startDate = row.genesis__Start_Date__c;
    let endDate = row.genesis__End_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (startDate === '' || startDate === null || startDate === undefined || startDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment start date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (endDate === '' || endDate === null || endDate === undefined || endDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (startDate>endDate ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Previous employment end date needs to be greater than start date.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var otherIncomeModel = skuid.model.getModel('OtherIncomeModel');

$.each(otherIncomeModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                 message: 'Income name can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});


if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step6');
}

</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" name="validateAssetsAndLiabilities" cachelocation="false">var params = arguments[0],

let moveToNextStep = true;

var assetInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('AssetInformationModel');

$.each(assetInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    
    let acquisitionDate = row.genesis__Date_of_Acquisition__c;
    let marketValueDate = row.genesis__Market_Value_Date__c;
    let today = $.datepicker.formatDate('yy-mm-dd', new Date());

    if (acquisitionDate === '' || acquisitionDate === null || acquisitionDate === undefined || acquisitionDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Date of Acquisition cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    if (marketValueDate === '' || marketValueDate === null || marketValueDate === undefined || marketValueDate>today ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Market Value Date cannot be future date or blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }
    
    let name = row.Name;
    if (name === '' || name === null || name === undefined ) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Asset description can not be blank.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});

var liabilityInformationModel = skuid.model.getModel('LiabilityInformationModel');

$.each(liabilityInformationModel.data,function(i,row){
    let paymentAmount = row.genesis__Payment_Amount__c;
    let amountOwing = row.genesis__Amount_Owing__c;
    
    if (paymentAmount>amountOwing) {
        stepEditor.handleMessages( 
    
             [{
    
                message: 'Payment amount cannot be greater than amount owing.', 
                severity: 'ERROR'
            }]
        );
        
        moveToNextStep = false;
        return false;
    }

});



if(moveToNextStep)
{
    var wizard = $('.nx-wizard').data('object');
    var currentStep = wizard.steps[wizard.currentstep];
    currentStep.navigate('step7');
}</jsitem><jsitem location="inlinesnippet" cachelocation="false" name="successMessage">var params = arguments[0],

    newcontactModel.updateRow(newContactRow, {Is_the_applicant_s_age_less_than_18_yrs__c: true});
